means: 鬼鬼祟祟的，诡秘的，偷偷摸摸的

sentence.Network_en: Sometimes our expectations sneak up on us unawares.
sentence.Network_cn: 有些时候，我们期待的事情会不期而至。

sentence.Network_en: They attended a sneak preview of the winter fashion collection.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们参观了一次对内的冬季时装预展.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Ugly Betty 丑女贝蒂第一季第二十集... ... disappoint： 使失望 sneak： 鬼鬼祟祟，偷偷 decision： 决定.
2形联想snake蛇都是s的它的足迹也是sway的比较鬼鬼祟祟sneak 3胡思乱想brassybra.
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... snatch 夺取 sneak 潜行 sneer 嘲笑.
小学生怎么记忆英语单词？？？？_爱问知识人 ... marital adj. 婚姻的 sneak v. 鬼祟而行，偷窃 friend – r → fiend n. 恶魔，魔鬼.

list.abs: sneak out of 逃避sneak thief 小偷sneak 偷窃
工作、薪酬词汇 ... time recorder 打卡机 sneak out 开溜 internship 实习.
龙与地下城美服词汇翻译_百度知道 ... slowburst 断筋 Sneak attack 偷袭 songblade 歌刃.
拉穆尼阵营文宣「抢先看」（sneak peek），误拼成SNEAK-PEAK。翻摄网路 【蔡筱雯╱综合外电报导】美国总统大选选情增温，笃 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: probably dialect; perhaps related to obsolete snike 'to creep'

entry.def: If you sneak somewhere, you go there very quietly on foot, trying to avoid being seen or heard.

example.ex: Sometimes he would sneak out of his house late at night to be with me...
example.tran: 有时候，他会在深夜里偷偷溜出家与我相会。

entry.def: If you sneak something somewhere, you take it there secretly.

example.ex: He smuggled papers out each day, photocopied them, and snuck them back...
example.tran: 他每天都把文件偷偷地带出去复印，然后再偷偷地拿回来。

example.ex: You even snuck me a cigarette.
example.tran: 你居然偷偷塞给我一支烟。

entry.def: If you sneak a look at someone or something, you secretly have a quick look at them.

example.ex: You sneak a look at your watch to see how long you've got to wait.
example.tran: 你偷偷地望一眼手表，看看要等多长时间。

means.word_mean: 1. someone who prowls or sneaks about; usually with unlawful intentions
2. someone acting as an informer or decoy for the police

sentences.sentence: "..stead of sneaking around spying on the neighbor's house"

means.word_mean: 2. put, bring, or take in a secretive or furtive manner;
3. make off with belongings of others

sentences.sentence: "He slipped me the key when nobody was looking"

means.word_mean: 1. marked by quiet and caution and secrecy; taking pains to avoid being observed;

auth_sentence.content: I think mosquitoes can sneak onboard ships or planes?
auth_sentence.res_content: I think mosquitoes can sneak onboard ships or planes?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I think mosquitoes can sneak onboard ships or planes?

auth_sentence.content: I guess we better sneak you out of here.
auth_sentence.res_content: I guess we better sneak you out of here.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I guess we better sneak you out of here.

auth_sentence.content: Times Travel's Jane Knight got a sneak preview.
auth_sentence.res_content: Times Travel's Jane Knight got a sneak preview.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Times Travel's Jane Knight got a sneak preview.

sentences.en: He sneaked away in the middle of the meeting.
sentences.cn: 他在会议中间悄悄离开了。

sentences.en: He was caught sneaking an apple from a shop.
sentences.cn: 他在商店里偷苹果时被抓住了。

jushi.english: I want to sneak a look at his book.
jushi.chinese: 我想偷偷地看一看他的书。

jushi.english: He sneaked a look at her as she was passing by.
jushi.chinese: 当她走过时,他偷偷地看了她一眼。

jushi.english: I tried to sneak her some turkey, but the nurse stopped me.
jushi.chinese: 我试图偷偷地送些火鸡肉给她,但被护士拦住了。
